Room.Name: The Cook's Wagon
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing in a beatifully arranged kitchen with deliciously smelling soups, stews and desserts. You may not leave without trying them out.
Room.LongDescription: This is the place where one might forget about his current and future adventures and sink into the dream world of sumptuous delicacies such as luscious lasagnas, outstanding hors d'ouvres, creamy chocolate mousse, big red strawberries with freshly whipped cream, juicy baklava pieces, large and flat meatballs, reddish orange lobsters, all kinds of recenty picked fruits and vegetables, haskovian pork chops and many many other things you've dreamt to eat. The Cook is obviously one of the best known around and he has some serving boys who help him in the creation of the delicious foods.
